examples.example: 我在大学里度过了充实且美好的时光，收获了知识与成长。

translate.english: I spent a full and wonderful time in the university and gained knowledge and growth.

examples.example: 我渴望在大学里提升自己，追求梦想，实现人生价值。

translate.english: I am eager to improve myself in the university, pursue my dream and realize the value of life.

examples.example: 在大学里，我结交了许多志同道合的朋友，一起度过了难忘的青春岁月。

translate.english: In the university, I made many like-minded friends and spent the unforgettable youthful years together.
